name: Motesolo: No Girlfriend Since Birth
description:
Everyone was a solo when they were born.
All of us were solo at least once.
And Someone even now..

[Synopsis]


On a late afternoon in Seoul, There are two people having a blind date in cafe.
But this man is so suspicious. He acts like the man who doesn't have any girl friend.
Unfortunately this is true. yes. He is NGSB. No GirlFriend Since Birth.

He is 29 years old and There is saying that the virgin in 30 will finally become a black magician .
There are only bunch of boys in his life like men's middle school, men's high school, major in computer in Univ and military..
This is last chance to have a girl friend before turning into 30 in this blind date.
His life depends on your choices.

[Characters]

His name is Kang Ki-mo who got you to spy on the conversation.
Kang Ki-mo is an ordinary office worker who likes DIY and playing games.
However, he is the man who has never had a relationship with a woman.

Motesolo means no girl friend since birth in Korea.
Kimo is Motesolo who even haven't held the a woman's hand in his life.
Do you think he will success on this blind date?

[How Play?]


1. Conversation selection
You become the protagonist and you can choose the conversation the protagonist will answer.
And all of these choices can affect the ending.
The progress of the game changes according to your choice.

2. Interaction
Throughout the game, players interact not only with characters, but also with their surroundings and objects.
You can sit down and explore the world on your phone,
You can also wander around to acquire items or do research.

3. Mini Game
Various mini-games appear according to the situation
You shouldn't slow down your tension.

Mind tracking

Become a love tracker! What is the heart of the man (she)? Notice the game starts! One..

[Game features]

- Progress that changes according to player actions
- Beautiful shooting, non-linear ending progress
- Multiple choice synopsis with infinite endings
- Interactive producing
- And.... Hidden Ending
